name: Ambulance Simulator (itch)
description:
Ambulance Simulator | Ludum Dare 50

You are the medic on an endless ambulance ride to the hospital. With the doc' on the phone, how long can you keep your patient alive? 

How to play

Click and drag the required items to the patient.

Game created by CaptaiinMz and ThePW for Ludum Dare 50 with the theme "Delay the inevitable". All assets created by us.
